title: Hilaria Baldwin
summary: Hilaria Baldwin (born Hillary Lynn Hayward-Thomas, January 6, 1984) is an American yoga instructor, entrepreneur, podcaster, and author. She was the co-founder of a chain of New York-based yoga studios called Yoga Vida, and has released an exercise DVD and a wellness-focused book. She has been married to actor Alec Baldwin since 2012.Baldwin, who is from the United States and says she vacationed in Spain in her youth, has at times represented herself as being from Spain, which has spurred accusations of cultural appropriation or "identity hoax[ing]".
